title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 450 - Petroleum Business Bond Or Other Security
content:

State Regulations
§ 450.1 - Bond or other security
§ 450.2 - Determination of the need for an amount of bond or other security

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 450

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 302, 1096

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
